about.name: Santorini
about.info_text: Santorini is a breathtaking island in the Aegean Sea, known for its stunning landscapes, picturesque villages, and crystal-clear waters. It's often considered one of the most romantic and beautiful destinations in the world. The island's white-washed buildings with blue-domed churches, dramatic cliffs, and panoramic sunsets make it a popular choice for travelers seeking a romantic getaway or a tranquil retreat.

attractions_card.title: Oia
attractions_card.description: Oia is a charming village famous for its iconic blue-domed churches, narrow streets, and breathtaking sunset views.

attractions_card.title: Fira
attractions_card.description: Fira is the capital of Santorini, offering a mix of modern and traditional architecture, as well as a vibrant nightlife scene.

attractions_card.title: Akrotiri Archaeological Site
attractions_card.description: Akrotiri is an ancient Minoan city buried by volcanic ash, often referred to as the "Minoan Pompeii."

attractions_card.title: Red Beach
attractions_card.description: The Red Beach is a unique and beautiful beach with red and black volcanic rocks, offering a striking contrast with the blue waters.

attractions_card.title: Perissa Beach
attractions_card.description: Perissa Beach is a popular black sand beach with a lively atmosphere, water sports, and beachfront restaurants.

attractions_card.title: Ancient Thera
attractions_card.description: Ancient Thera is an archaeological site with well-preserved ruins, offering a glimpse into the island's ancient history.

attractions_card.title: Wine Tasting
attractions_card.description: Santorini is known for its unique volcanic wines. Visitors can explore the island's wineries and enjoy wine tasting tours.

attractions_card.title: Boat Tours
attractions_card.description: Boat tours around the caldera, hot springs, and nearby islands offer stunning views and the chance to swim in volcanic waters.

food_card.title: Greek Salad
food_card.description: Greek Salad is a fresh and delicious dish made with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and olive oil.

food_card.title: Santorini Tomatoes
food_card.description: Santorini is known for its sweet and flavorful cherry tomatoes, often used in local dishes and salads.

food_card.title: Fresh Seafood
food_card.description: Santorini offers a variety of fresh seafood, including grilled fish, octopus, and calamari, often enjoyed with sea views.

food_card.title: Souvlaki
food_card.description: Souvlaki is a popular Greek street food made with skewered and grilled meat, often served in pita bread with vegetables and tzatziki sauce.

food_card.title: Santorini Wine
food_card.description: Santorini produces unique wines due to its volcanic soil. Assyrtiko is a popular white wine variety.

hotels_card.title: Grace Hotel Santorini
hotels_card.description: Grace Hotel is a luxurious boutique hotel in Santorini, offering stunning views, elegant rooms, and excellent dining.

hotels_card.title: Canaves Oia
hotels_card.description: Canaves Oia is a collection of beautiful suites and villas in Oia with private plunge pools and an infinity pool.

hotels_card.title: Kapari Natural Resort
hotels_card.description: Kapari Natural Resort is a serene and eco-friendly hotel in Imerovigli, offering a peaceful and romantic escape.

hotels_card.title: Perissa Bay Hotel
hotels_card.description: Perissa Bay Hotel is a comfortable and budget-friendly option with easy access to Perissa Beach.

hotels_card.title: Youth Hostels
hotels_card.description: Santorini offers youth hostels and budget accommodations for travelers on a tighter budget.

transport_card.title: Santorini Airport
transport_card.description: Santorini Airport (JTR) serves domestic and international flights, making it the primary gateway to the island.

transport_card.title: Public Buses
transport_card.description: Santorini has a public bus system connecting major towns and attractions, offering an affordable way to get around.

transport_card.title: Car Rentals
transport_card.description: Renting a car or an ATV is a convenient way to explore the island and access remote locations.

transport_card.title: Boat Tours
transport_card.description: Boat tours and ferries are available for exploring nearby islands and the caldera.
